title: Skin: it's all around you
creator_credit: Stephen Wallen and Alfred Higgins Productions
brief_description: Teaches the anatomy of the skin and its functions - how it protects, how it heals itself, how it is constructed, and how to care for it. Suitable for upper primary, lower and middle secondary levels.
